pools.lockupPeriodInfo: The unbond period is the amount you must wait before withdrawing your ADX tokens. From the moment you request unbonding, the {{count}} day start counting. During those days, you won't receive staking rewards.
pools.lockupPeriodInfo_plural: The unbond period is the amount you must wait before withdrawing your ADX tokens. From the moment you request unbonding, the {{count}} days start counting. During those days, you won't receive staking rewards.
pools.loPoRewardPolicy: By depositing ADX you receive ADX-LOYALTY, which automatically incurs new rewards in ADX based on elastic issuance, while also allowing you to participate in AdEx governance.
pools.tomRewardPolicy: The "Validator Tom" pool will distribute its fee earnings proportionally to each staker. The fee earnings will be 7% of the total volume, which you can track on our Explorer. There is an additional incentive reward of 7 million ADX to be distributed by the end of 2020.
pools.tomLockupPeriodTxt: 30 days (30 days need to pas before unlocking ADX, during that period no rewards are received)
pools.tomPurpose: Staking ADX tokens towards the reputation of our main validator
pools.tomV5Purpose: Staking ADX tokens towards the reputation of our main validator
pools.tomV5RewardPolicy: The "Validator Tom" pool will distribute its fee earnings proportionally to each staker. The fee earnings will be 7% of the total volume, which you can track on our Explorer. There is an additional incentive reward of 7 million ADX to be distributed by the end of 2020.
pools.tomLegacyPoolDisabledInfo: Staking to Tom Legacy pool is disabled. Use updated pool.

email.subscribe: Subscribe for AdEx News for exclusive content
email.gdprLabel: Yes, I want AdEx Network to send me news and other related content
email.promotionTerms: I agree to the promotional <externalLink> Terms and conditions </externalLink>

deposits.rageLeaveWarning: By committing "rage leave " you will skip the lockup period of {{lockupPeriod}} days but will receive {{percent}} % of the {{token}} withdraw amount. The rest of the {{token}} amount will stay for the pool total balance.

bonds.bondExplanationMsg: This table will show all your individual ADX deposits in validator pools (bonds), along with information as status, amount and current APY. By using the action buttons, you will be able to request unbonding and withdraw your ADX after the {{count}} day lock-up period.
bonds.bondExplanationMsg_plural: This table will show all your individual ADX deposits in validator pools (bonds), along with information as status, amount and current APY. By using the action buttons, you will be able to request unbonding and withdraw your ADX after the {{count}} days lock-up period.
bonds.confirmationLabel: I understand I am locking up my ADX for at least {{unbondDays}} days and I am familiar with the <e1> Terms and conditions </e1> and <e2> </e2>  staking conditions
bonds.confirmationLabelMigrationWithdraw: I understand I will receive total amount of {{amount}} {{currency}} on my wallet address {{walletAddr}}
bonds.stakeNewAccIdentityBalance: You can stake {{amount}} {{currency}} at the moment. This is the balance on your gasless address.
bonds.reBondInfo: You can re-bond while there is pending or ready unbond request
bonds.migrationAlertText2: AdEx Staking Update: Migrating the Validator Tom Contract
bonds.migrationAlertText4: 23 March: unbonding on the old pool disabled.
bonds.migrationAlertText5: 31 March: Migration is live: migration contract and new staking pool are launched, old staking pool becomes inactive and will receive no more rewards.
bonds.migrationUnbondDisableMsg: Unbonds are disabled due to staking migration. More info <externalLink> at our blog </externalLink/>

gasless.connectWalletToSeeAddr: connect wallet to see gasless staking address
gasless.copiedToClipboard: Gasless Staking address {{identityAddr}} copied to clipboard
gasless.addrTooltip: This is the address of your gasless account: it's an automatically calculated (CREATE2) smart contract address that will be created once the first transaction is issued.
gasless.bullet1: Deposit ADX to this address.When there's a minimum of {{minBalance}} {{currency}} deposited, you can click "Stake" and that amount will be staked without gas fees.
gasless.bullet2: You can send ADX from wallets and exchanges as many times as you want before clicking "Stake".
gasless.bullet3: Gasless staking is limited to one stake in {{count}} hour
gasless.bullet3_plural: Gasless staking is limited to one stake in {{count}} hours
gasless.info: Once you send your gasless transactions, it will take some time for it to be executed on the chain. Please be patient. Your stats will be updated when the transaction is confirmed. Confirmation time depends on network load. You can see all transactions of your gasless address <external> HERE </external>

errors.lessThanMinPoolADX: ADX amount less than minimum required for selected pool!
errors.amountOverPoolLimit: ADX amount too large - will go over the pool total deposits limit!
errors.minGaslessReStake: Not enough rewards (min rewards for gasless re-stake {{amount}} {{currency}})
errors.noEthBrowserDetected: No Ethereum browser extension detected, install MetaMask on desktop or visit from a dApp browser on mobile.
errors.connectedToUnsupportedNetwork: You're connected to an unsupported network.
errors.siteNotAuth: Please authorize this website to access your Ethereum account.
errors.unknownCheckConsole: An unknown error occurred. Check the console for more details.
errors.cantDeployAndStakeMore: Can not deploy and stake amount different than identity balance
errors.lessDanMinPoolAmount: {{currency}} amount less than minimum required for selected pool!
errors.cantCallLPPricesWithoutADXUSDValue: ADX usd value not provided. Can't calculate LP tokens prices
errors.canCalcLPTokensPrices: Error while calculating LP tokens prices.

messages.connectToMainnet: Please, connect to mainnet ethereum network.
messages.useIdleTitle: You have been idle for more than {{minutes}} minutes. Your session has ben paused.

dialogs.bondConfirmation:
Are you sure you want to request unbonding of {{amount}} {{currency}} Please be aware:
  1. It will take {{unbondDays}} days before you will be able to withdraw your {{currency}} !
  2. You will not receive staking rewards for this amount in this {{unbondDays}} day period.
dialogs.reStakeConfirmation: <box> Are you sure you want to re-stake your earnings of {{amount}} {{currency}} </box> <box> Please be aware that this means that this amount will be locked up for at least {{unbondDays}} days </box> <box> {{extraInfo}} </box>
dialogs.reActivatingInfo: Your bond will be re-activated, meaning that your request to unbond will be cancelled but it will start earning rewards again.
dialogs.claimConfirmation: You are about to claim your earnings of
dialogs.harvestAllConfirmation: You are going to harvest all of your rewards - {{amount}} {{currency}}.
dialogs.reBondConfirmation: <box> Are you sure you want to re-bond this "{{poolName}}" bond of {{amount}} {{currency}} </box> <box> Please be aware that this means that this amount will be locked up again for at least {{unbondDays}} days </box> <box> {{extraInfo}} </box>
dialogs.migrationRequestConfirmation:
You are about to migrate this "{{poolName}}" bond of {{amount}} {{currency}} Please be aware:
  1. It will take {{unbondDays}} days before you can finalize the migration process (additional action will be required).
  2. You will NOT receive staking rewards for this {{unbondDays}} day period.
  3. You will receive a migration reward of minimum {{migrationReward}} {{currency}} ( (equal the staking rewards for 2 months) when you finalize the migration.
  4. All of your unclaimed rewards when finalizing the process ({{unbondPeriod}} day from now) will be added to your migrated bond. The additional migration reward will be added this amount too.
  6. Your migrated bond will have a lockup period {{unbondDaysV5}} days
dialogs.migrationFinalizationConfirmation:
You are about to complete migration process for this "{{poolName}}" bond of {{amount}} {{currency}} Please be aware:
  1. All of your unclaimed rewards will be added to your migrated bond.
  2. If you wish, you can withdraw your unclaimed rewards without your wallet before finalizing the migration.
  3. You will receive migration reward of {{migrationReward}} {{currency}}. It will be added to your migrated bond.
  4. Your migrated bond will have a lockup period {{unbondDaysV5}} days.
dialogs.bondToV5MigrationConfirmation:
Are you sure you want to request unbond/migration of {{amount}} {{currency}} Please be aware:
  1. It will take {{unbondDays}} days before you will be able to finalize migration process or unbond your {{currency}} !
  2. You will not receive staking rewards for this amount in this {{unbondDays}} day period.
  3. If you chose to migrate the bond you will get extra reward to compensate the lack of rewards for the {{unbondDays}} period.

legacy.p1: The ADX token completed a successful upgrade to a new smart contract. You are currently holding {{amount}} legacy ADX
legacy.p2: Starting August 21st 2020, the legacy ADX will be deprecated and will no longer be traded on exchanges or used for staking.
legacy.p3: We recommend that you swap your legacy ADX right now by clicking the Swap now button and signing the {{wallet}} transactions
legacy.p4: <farmer>ðŸŒ¾</farmer> After this, you can stake your ADX to earn up to 50% APY (annual percentage yield) with no slashing risk <external> read more </external>. <farmer>ðŸŒ¾</farmer>
legacy.swapInProgress: Token swap is in progress! It will be completed once all your pending transactions have been confirmed.

popups.proudOwnerOfADX: You are the proud owner of the new ADX token. You can stake them right away to receive rewards
popups.migrationAlertInfoMigrate: You have Tom staking pool bond ready to be migrated
popups.migrationAlertInfoMigrate_plural: You have Tom staking pool bonds ready to be migrated
